Implemented Security Controls.Payout Control: cash function prevents double payouts by marking subpots as cashed.
Implemented Security Controls.Partial Refunds: fallback function refunds excess funds for incomplete ticket purchases.

Vulnerabilities.Unchecked Low-Level Calls: No validation on winner.send(subpot) and msg.sender.send(msg.value - value), potentially leading to Ether loss.
Vulnerabilities.Predictable Randomness: Block hash is used for winner selection, making the randomness potentially predictable.

Fallback Functionality: Handles incoming funds to allocate tickets or issue refunds.
